books.title: Wings of fire
books.description: Every common man who by his sheer grit and hard work achieves success should share his story with the rest for they may find inspiration and strength to go on, in his story
books.author: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam

books.title: The Murder of Roger Acgroyd
books.description: Her Miss Marple series strongly influenced the cozy mystery sub-genre that would come later. And Then There Were None is also notable, inspiring the locked-room mystery set in a remote location trope
books.author: Agatha Christie

books.title: Ramayan
books.description: The Ramayana was composed in Sanskrit, probably not before 300 bce, by the poet Valmiki and in its present form consists of some 24,000 couplets divided into seven books.
books.author: Valmiki

books.title: Elon Musk
books.description: How Elon Musk able to become an extraordinary man.
books.author: Ashlee Vance
